name: playwright-react-test
description: Test your React components (currently only works with TypeScript and ESBuild compiler).

scripts.build: npx esbuild src/*.ts --platform=node --format=cjs --outdir=dist/ --drop-labels=PWRIGHT_REACT_TEST_DEV && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && npx html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-style-link-type-attributes --minify-css true --minify-js true --input-dir src/ --output-dir dist/ --file-ext html
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test && npx tsx ./testbuild.ts

author: Kevin Muret <kevmuret@gmail.com>
